Package org.apache.juneau.soap

Class SoapXmlSerializer

java.lang.Object
org.apache.juneau.Context
org.apache.juneau.BeanContextable
org.apache.juneau.BeanTraverseContext
org.apache.juneau.serializer.Serializer
org.apache.juneau.serializer.WriterSerializer
org.apache.juneau.xml.XmlSerializer
org.apache.juneau.soap.SoapXmlSerializer
All Implemented Interfaces:
AnnotationProvider, SoapXmlMetaProvider, XmlMetaProvider
public class SoapXmlSerializer extends XmlSerializer implements SoapXmlMetaProvider
Serializes POJOs to HTTP responses as XML+SOAP.
Media types
Handles Accept types: text/xml+soap

Produces Content-Type types: text/xml+soap

Description
Essentially the same output as XmlDocSerializer, except wrapped in a standard SOAP envelope.
Notes:
  • This class is thread safe and reusable.
